apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss person, man with dark skin tone and medium-dark skin tone emoji captures a loving and affectionate embrace between two men. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients lend a warm, inviting glow to their skin tones and the subtle blush on their cheeks, while soft rounded edges ensure a gentle and romantic depiction. This emoji on Apple devices is a powerful and inclusive way to express deep affection, romantic love, or a passionate kiss between a couple.
